languages.text: "Да вы искушенн{mf|ый|ая} ценитель{mf||ница}, Ваша Светлость! Только {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}истинн{mf|ый|ая} аристократ{mf||ка}{/d}, знаком{mf|ый|ая} с благородным искусством охоты, распознает всю безупречность этой чудесной игрушки! Видите филигрань на прикладе? Ручная работа мастера Горенова! Идеальная орудие для…" {n}Фактотум осекается и бледнеет.{/n} "Как бестактно с моей стороны! Вы так деликатно намекнули, а я... Прошу, примите это оружие в дар!"

"You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"
languages.original_text: "Да вы искушенн{mf|ый|ая} ценитель{mf||ница}, Ваша Светлость! Только {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}истинн{mf|ый|ая} аристократ{mf||ка}{/d}, знаком{mf|ый|ая} с благородным искусством охоты, распознает всю безупречность этой чудесной игрушки! Видите филигрань на прикладе? Ручная работа мастера Горенова! Идеальная орудие для…" {n}Фактотум осекается и бледнеет.{/n} "Как бестактно с моей стороны! Вы так деликатно намекнули, а я... Прошу, примите это оружие в дар!"

Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

languages.text: "Ihr habt ein scharfes Auge, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Nur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}wahre Aristokraten{/d}, die in der hohen Kunst der Jagd bewandert sind, wüssten die Perfektion dieses Spielzeuges zu schätzen! Darf ich Eure Aufmerksamkeit auf die Filigranarbeit am Schaft lenken? Ein Werk von Meister Gorenov selbst. Eine superbe Waffe für ..." {n}Er unterbricht sich und erblasst.{/n} "Wie rüpelhaft von mir! Eine so taktvolle Andeutung und ich mache mich zum Narren ... Bitte akzeptiert diese Waffe als Geschenk!"
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

Nur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}wahre Aristokraten{/d}, die in der hohen Kunst der Jagd bewandert sind, wüssten die Perfektion dieses Spielzeuges zu schätzen! Darf ich Eure Aufmerksamkeit auf die Filigranarbeit am Schaft lenken? Ein Werk von Meister Gorenov selbst. Eine superbe Waffe für ..." {n}Er unterbricht sich und erblasst.{/n} "Wie rüpelhaft von mir! Eine so taktvolle Andeutung und ich mache mich zum Narren ... Bitte akzeptiert diese Waffe als Geschenk!"

languages.text: « Vous avez l'œil, Votre Seigneurie ! Seul {mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}véritable aristocrate{/d} {mf|versé|versée} dans l'art subtil de la chasse est capable d'apprécier la perfection de ce joli jouet ! Puis-je attirer votre attention sur le filigrane de la crosse ? C'est l'œuvre de maître Gorenov en personne ! Une arme superbe pour... {n}Il s'interrompt et pâlit brusquement.{/n} Quel rustre je fais ! Je viens de me ridiculiser en ne saisissant pas votre demande pourtant pleine de tact... Tenez, je vous prie d'accepter cette arme ! »
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez l'œil, Votre Seigneurie ! Seul {mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}véritable aristocrate{/d} {mf|versé|versée} dans l'art subtil de la chasse est capable d'apprécier la perfection de ce joli jouet ! Puis-je attirer votre attention sur le filigrane de la crosse ? C'est l'œuvre de maître Gorenov en personne ! Une arme superbe pour... {n}Il s'interrompt et pâlit brusquement.{/n} Quel rustre je fais ! Je viens de me ridiculiser en ne saisissant pas votre demande pourtant pleine de tact... Tenez, je vous prie d'accepter cette arme ! »

languages.text: «¡Tiene un ojo excelente, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Solo un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}verdader{mf|o|a} aristócrata{/d} que conozca bien el sofisticado arte de la caza sabría apreciar la perfección de esta preciosidad! ¿Puedo destacar la filigrana de la culata? ¡Obra del propio maestro Gorenov! Es un arma ideal para...». {n}De pronto, se interrumpe y palidece.{/n} «¡Si seré patán! Usted lanzando indirectas sutiles, y yo aquí, comportándome como un pasmarote... ¡Por favor, permita que le regale el arma!».
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tiene un ojo excelente, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Solo un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}verdader{mf|o|a} aristócrata{/d} que conozca bien el sofisticado arte de la caza sabría apreciar la perfección de esta preciosidad! ¿Puedo destacar la filigrana de la culata? ¡Obra del propio maestro Gorenov! Es un arma ideal para...». {n}De pronto, se interrumpe y palidece.{/n} «¡Si seré patán! Usted lanzando indirectas sutiles, y yo aquí, comportándome como un pasmarote... ¡Por favor, permita que le regale el arma!».

languages.text: 「目が肥えておいでですな、陛下！ｋの洗練されたオモチャの完璧さを理解できるのは、狩猟の精緻な技術に精通した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}真の貴族{/d}のみなのです！ストックに施されたフィリグリーにご注目いただけますか？マスター・ゴレノフが自ら施したものです！実に素晴らしい武器で…」{n}彼は不意に言葉を止め、顔色をなくす。{/n}「私としたことが、なんと野暮なことを！このように機転を利かせていただいたというのに、馬鹿なことをしてしまいました。どうか、この武器を贈り物としてお受け取りください！」
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

traits.locale_text: 「目が肥えておいでですな、陛下！ｋの洗練されたオモチャの完璧さを理解できるのは、狩猟の精緻な技術に精通した{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}真の貴族{/d}のみなのです！ストックに施されたフィリグリーにご注目いただけますか？マスター・ゴレノフが自ら施したものです！実に素晴らしい武器で…」{n}彼は不意に言葉を止め、顔色をなくす。{/n}「私としたことが、なんと野暮なことを！このように機転を利かせていただいたというのに、馬鹿なことをしてしまいました。どうか、この武器を贈り物としてお受け取りください！」

languages.text: “大人，您的眼力可真了不起！只有精通狩猎艺术的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}真正贵族{/d}，才能欣赏这件玩具的精妙之处！可以请您留意一下枪柄上的金银丝细工吗？这可是格列诺夫大师本人亲自制作的！如此卓尔不群的武器，最适合——”{n}他突然住了口，脸色发白。{/n}“我真是太驽钝了！您明明暗示得这么委婉，可我却没听懂您的言外之意……请收下这把武器，作为献给您的礼物！”
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，您的眼力可真了不起！只有精通狩猎艺术的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}真正贵族{/d}，才能欣赏这件玩具的精妙之处！可以请您留意一下枪柄上的金银丝细工吗？这可是格列诺夫大师本人亲自制作的！如此卓尔不群的武器，最适合——”{n}他突然住了口，脸色发白。{/n}“我真是太驽钝了！您明明暗示得这么委婉，可我却没听懂您的言外之意……请收下这把武器，作为献给您的礼物！”

languages.text: "Zevk sahibi olduğunuz belli {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ancak avcılık dediğimiz incelikli sanata aşina olan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}gerçek bir aristokrat{/d}, bu güzelim aletin mükemmeliyetini takdir edebilir! Dikkatinizi kıçındaki telkâri işçiliğe çekmemde bir sakınca var mıdır? Üstat Gorenov, kendi elleriyle yapmıştır bunu! Bu müthiş silah tam da..." {n}Kendine mâni oluyor, birden benzi atıyor.{/n} "Aman, kabalığımı bağışlayın! Nazik imanız karşılığında ahmaklık ettim... Ne olur, bu silahı hediye olarak kabul ediniz!"
languages.original_text: "You have a discerning eye, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Only a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}true aristocrat{/d} versed in the sophisticated art of hunting would appreciate the perfection that is this handsome toy! May I direct your attention to the filigree on the stock? Made by Master Gorenov himself! A superb weapon for—" {n}He stops himself and suddenly goes pale.{/n} "How utterly boorish of me! Such a tactful intimation, and I have made a fool of myself... Please, accept this weapon as a gift!"
